metadata.name: Nakedness and Materiality #1
metadata.description:
# 1 / 200
Collaboration with Kurumi Narazaki.

Nakedness and Materiality is a collection by Yoichi Ochiai. Each NFT is a unique piece, and the total collection consists of 200 NFTs. Each NFT has 12 physical print editions. (ED10,AP1,EC1)

In 1980, video artist Nam June Paik named the remote-expression, energy-free way of life the Stationary Nomads, and since 2020, post-corona humanity has been accidentally approaching the Stationary Nomads. This collection is about nudity and physicality in order to reconsider the changes that are taking place in our time: a body that is detached from materiality and excessively dressed up by avatars and icons in digital space.

Nakedness and Materiality #1
5844 × 9499 in JPG format,
Yoichi Ochiai, 2022

Model: Kurumi Narazaki
